TopicTitle: Save ports into 0.21: How's your Mun base?

Articles.Content:
So, I've ported my save into 0.21 and wanted to check if my Base was destroyed when...

IT'S STILL THERE! THIS IS JUST FANTASTIC!

For the looks of it, the new Mun landscape didn't destroy any of my ships and probes that I landed there, what a relief!

When I switched to some landers and probes, in the beginning when it was loading, it seemed that they were under the ground or partially under. But the ship/probe seems to bump upwards and land safely into the ground.

Bill Kerman's still alive people!

There was something though, when I switched to a probe, it was up in the air. I guess that a crater was added since my probe began falling and landing in a steep slope. Nevertheless, when the probe hit stable ground, it was ok!

How's your Mun base in your port? Was it entirely destroyed or not? Were your probes and landers destroyed?
Pretty incredible they survived the giant cataclysm.

Wow, congrats!

Also, I have no Mun bases/ported saves. Even so it uses outdated mods.
I tried using the save converter and it wouldn't let me leave my probe to go back to the space center! I had to alt-f4! lol Lucky you that it survived

Wow, congrats!

Also, I have no Mun bases/ported saves. Even so it uses outdated mods.

Thanks, though I still don't know, did somebody have a craft of his/her to be destroyed by the new landscape?
